format: A data frame with 50 observations on the following 19 variables.
reference: These data are not well-documented. You guys are on your own here. Good luck.
title: Minimum Legal Drinking Age Fatalities Data
description:
Description
These are data you can use to replicate the regression discontinuity design
analyses throughout Chapter 4 of Mastering 'Metrics.
Original analyses come from Carpenter and Dobkin (2009, 2011).
